location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 10/26 Drilling for water by BAPCO at Jufair'

physicalDescription.extent: The foliation sequence is written in pencil, in the top right corner of each folio. The numbering begins on the front cover, on number 1, then 2A, 2B; and then it carries on until 4, which is the last number given on the back cover of the file.

mods.abstract: The file contains a confidential letter from the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representative on the drilling and completion of a water well at Jufair, named 'Water Well no. 4'. There is an index (folio 3).

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
Shaikh Ḥamad bin 'Īsá Āl Khalīfah, Hakim of Bahrain
Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah
King of Saudi Arabia Sa'ūd bin 'Abd al-'Azīz Āl Sa'ūd
